entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
